short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Control banners that use the GSAP plugin by using the Timeline expression with the variable (tl).

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Have you ever wanted total control over your banner animations while testing them?

Our Chrome extension is here to help! With GSAP Banner Control, you can easily manipulate and adjust your animated banners, making it perfect for developers and designers looking for an efficient and user-friendly tool.

💪🫵🚨🚧🧰🔧🔨🛠️✏️
🚨Key Features: 🚨
👉 Play and Pause: Control the playback of your banner animations with just one click.
👉 Adjust Speed: Is your animation too fast or slow? Change the speed in real-time to find the perfect pace.
👉 Restart: Jump back to the start of the animation at any time to easily repeat tests.
👉 Intuitive Interface: A simple and clear user interface that integrates directly into your browser, allowing you to handle your banners without hassle.
🧰 Benefits: 🧰
👉 Easy to Use: You don’t need to be a tech expert. Our interface is intuitive and easy for everyone to use.
👉 Time-Saving: Quickly adjust and test your banners without having to reload the page or make code changes.
👉 Compatible: Works with any banner that uses GSAP for animations.

Install GSAP Banner Control today and take your banner animation testing to the next level! 
Perfect for developers and designers who need efficiency and precision in their banner testing.
